name: Bronze and Gray Pearl, Sterling Silver Chain Cluster Necklace
description:
This striking necklace is made with 10mm bronze and gray pearls that have been individually wire wrapped onto sterling silver oxidized chain. 

The focal piece of the necklace consists of a delightful cluster of the bronze and gray pearls.  The two colors compliment each other beautifully.  The cluster is approximately 9 inches (22.86cm) in length. 

The side pieces of the necklace are made with sterling silver oxidized chain and the two pieces are connected with 6mm sterling silver Bali style beads.

The total length of the necklace is approximately 18 inches (45.72cm) in length, including the sterling silver lobster clasp. I added a 3 inch (7.62cm) sterling silver extender, with a sterling silver bead dangle. 

This is a gorgeous piece and would fit perfectly in a fall and/or winter wardrobe.

name: Carnelian Gemstone Gold Bead Earring and Necklace Set, Carnelian Jewelry Set
description:
This pretty set is made with carnelian rondelles surrounded by 6 and 3mm 14k gold filled beads.

The earrings are approximately one inch (2.54cm) in length, not including the 14k gold filled earring wire.

The necklace has a pendant that is identical to the earrings.  The pendant dangles from a 14k gold filled chain.  The necklace is approximately 18 inches (45.72cm) in length.  The chain has a 6mm 14k gold filled bead on each end, and a 14k gold filled lobster clasp.

If you need the necklace made a little shorter or longer for a perfect fit, please send me a message after checking out.  I will make the necessary adjustment before shipping.

name: Green Peridot Crystal Sterling Silver Earrings
description:
These pretty earrings are made with 12mm green peridot faceted crystal rondelles, sterling silver Bali style beads and sterling silver saucer and round beads.

The earrings are approximately one and one half inch (3.81cm) in length, including the sterling silver earring wire.

Peridot is the birthstone for August.

name: White Freshwater Pearl Five Strand Necklace, Multi Strand Pearl Necklace
description:
This necklace is made with five strands of luxurious white freshwater pearls.

The necklace is approximately 17 inches (43.18cm) in length and has 5mm sterling silver beads on the ends of each strand.  There is a sterling silver hook clasp and I added a three inch (7.62cm) sterling silver extender with a 5mm sterling silver bead dangle.

This necklace is very versatile.  It can be worn by a bride, with a business power suit or with your favorite jeans.

name: Sterling Silver Photo Charm Bracelet, Picture Bracelet, Family Bracelet - 25% Off For Limited Time
description:
This bracelet is my featured holiday gift item. It is on sale (25% off) until December 20th. No discount code needed, the price has already been adjusted.  Regularly $125, now $93.75 until December 20th.

Take your loved ones with you wherever you go with this beautiful all sterling silver photo charm bracelet.

The bracelet is made with sterling silver chain, sterling silver Bali style beads and has an open sterling silver heart toggle clasp.  The bracelet comes with one sterling silver textured photo double sided charm, so two pictures can be placed in the charm.  The photo charm has a sterling silver lobster clasp making it easy to attach anywhere on the bracelet that you want.  Additional photo charms can be purchased separately.

We all have loved ones who are dear to us, so this bracelet makes a perfect gift for mothers, grandmothers, expectant mothers, wives, girlfriends, significant others or BFFs.

Charms can be added to the bracelet as a family grows, and the bracelet can become a family heirloom that can be passed down from generation to generation.

The bracelet shown is approximately eight inches (20.32cm) in length, including the clasp. But, wrist sizes vary greatly and I want your bracelet to fit perfectly.

Please send me a message after you make your purchase and let me know the wrist measurement you need (in inches or centimeters). If you don’t know what size you need, use a tape measure to measure snugly around the wrist bone, with no extra space. I will size the bracelet loose enough for comfort and movement, but not so loose that it will slip off.

name: Sterling Silver Photo Charm Necklace, Picture Necklace, Family Necklace
description:
Wear your loved ones close to your heart with this beautiful all sterling silver photo charm necklace.

The photo piece of the necklace is a textured photo double sided charm and a sterling silver Bali style bead for a pendant that dangles from the chain.  Two pictures can be placed in the charm.  

The necklace is has a seventeen inch (43.18cm) sterling silver chain with sterling silver Bali style beads at each end and a sterling silver lobster clasp.  I added a three inch (7.62cm) sterling silver extender that has a sterling silver Bali style bead dangle.

This lovely necklace can become a keepsake and family heirloom, and is perfect for brides, mothers, grandmothers, expectant mothers, wives, girlfriends, significant others and even BFFs.

name: Green Mosaic Gold Bead Bracelet and Earring Set
description:
This bracelet and earring set is made with gorgeous green mosaic gemstones and 14k gold filled beads. The bracelet is approximately seven inches (17.78cm) in length and has a 14k gold filled lobster clasp and a one inch (2.54cm) 14k gold filled chain extender.

The earrings are made with green mosaic gemstones and 14k gold filled beads with 14k gold filled earring wire. The earrings are approximately one and one quarter inch in length, not including the earring wire.

The set will arrive in an attractive box suitable for gift giving.

name: White Baroque Cultured Pearl Necklace and Earring Set
description:
This beautiful set is simply elegant.  It is made with large white baroque cultured pearls and 14k gold filled components.  The necklace has a single pearl that suspends from a 14k gold filled chain.  The necklace has a large 14k gold filled lobster clasp and is approximately 17 inches (43.18cm) in length.

The earrings have one pearl and 14k gold filled lever back earring wire.  The earrings are approximately one and a half inch (3.81cm) in length, including the earring wire.

Baroque pearls are beautiful and unique, no two are exactly alike.  This set is timeless and would make a wonderful addition to any woman’s jewelry collection.

If you would like the set made with sterling silver components instead of gold filled, please let me know.

name: Cameo Three Strand White Pearl Vintage Styled Choker, Multi Strand Pearl Choker
description:
This beautiful choker is made with three strands of 6mm white Swarovski pearls.  The focal piece of this necklace is the gorgeous 30 x 44mm rhodium plated white and black vintage style cameo box clasp.  There are 5mm sterling silver round beads at both ends of each strand.

Because of the fact that necklace sizes vary greatly, this necklace is a custom piece.  You will need to measure your neck, and during check-out or after you have purchased the necklace, send me the neck measurement in either inches or centimeters.

There is a matching bracelet available in my store.

description:

The earrings are approximately one and one half inches (3.81cm) long, not including the sterling silver earring wire.

name: Black Tahitian Baroque Pearl Sterling Silver Necklace, Black Cultured Pearl Necklace

This necklace is made with beautiful black Tahitian baroque cultured pearls that are wire wrapped onto sterling silver chain.

The necklace connects in the center with a focal piece that consists of three chain drops with pearl dangles.

The black Tahitian pearls have beautiful green, purple and blue highlights.  As with all baroque pearls, no two are exactly alike.

The necklace is approximately 17 inches (43.18cm) in length including the sterling silver lobster clasp.  I added a three inch (7.62cm) sterling silver chain extender that has a 6mm sterling silver bead dangle.

name: Turquoise Magnesite Disc Bead Nepalese Pendant Necklace
description:
This necklace is striking.  It is made with turquoise magnesite disc beads ranging in size from 12 to 25mm.  The focal piece of the necklace is a large 68x43mm, oval shaped Nepalese pendant that is outlaid with brass, and inlaid with turquoise and coral.  The necklace is also accented with 6mm 14k gold filled beads.

I added an antique brass toggle clasp.  The necklace is approximately 18 and one half inches (46.99cm) in length.

This necklace definitely makes a statement and will turn heads.

Whether purchasing the necklace as a gift for yourself or someone else, it will arrive in a gift box.

name: Orange Mother of Pearl, Gold Bead Necklace and Earring Set

Necklace – The necklace has a 14k gold filled chain that has 5mm 14k gold filled beads at each end.  A orange mother of pearl bead, 6mm crystal copper Swarovski crystal and 14k gold saucer bead pendant suspends from the gold chain.

The necklace is approximately 18 inches (45.72cm) in length and has a 14k gold filled lobster clasp.

Earrings – The earrings match the pendant exactly and have 14k gold filled earring wire.

The earrings are approximately two inches (5.08cm) in length, including the earring wire.

Whether you are treating yourself or purchasing the set for someone else, it will arrive in a gift box with a bow.

description:

40 inch (101.6cm) rope necklace made with 12mm black onyx gemstones, surrounded by tiny sterling silver beads, 10mm dragon vein beads, 10mm silver gray pearls and 8mm black Swarovski pearls.  All the stones, pearls and beads are wire wrapped onto 5x7mm sterling silver oxidized chain.

30 inch (76.2cm) necklace made with 10mm silver gray pearls and 8mm black Swarovski crystals wire wrapped onto 6x3mm sterling silver oxidized chain.

17 inch (43.18cm) necklace made with 8mm black Swarovski pearls wire wrapped onto 2x2.5mm sterling silver oxidized chain.  There is a sterling silver lobster clasp and a three inch extender attached.

The necklaces can be worn together, two paired together or each worn separately.  The options are many. 

If you would like a matching bracelet or earrings made, please contact me..

The colors in this set give it limitless possibilities for a fall and winter wardrobe.

description:
This pretty anklet is just what the bride needs for her something blue.  It is made with 6mm aquamarine AB crystals that are wire wrapped onto pretty sterling silver chain. 
 
The anklet has a sterling silver lobster clasp and a delightful sterling silver puff heart and crystal dangle.
 
Ankle sizes vary greatly and I want your anklet to fit you perfectly, so I will need to know what size you need to anklet made. I make the anklet one inch larger than your ankle size.

If you are not sure what your ankle size is, please measure your ankle with a soft measuring tape right above the ankle bone. Or if you already have an anklet that fits the way you like, you can simply measure that anklet from end to end.  Click the Contact tab and send me a message with your ankle measurement (in either inches or centimeters) and after you have made your purchase I will make the anklet the size you request.

The anklet will arrive in an attractive box suitable for gift giving.

This necklace is big and bold and makes quite a statement.  It is made with two strands of large, chunky stabilized genuine turquoise nuggets.

This necklace is striking but it definitely is not for the faint of heart.  But if you like jewelry that makes a strong statement, this necklace is for you.  And speaking of strong, this necklace has a little weight to it.

It is approximately eighteen inches (45.72cm) in length and has a sterling silver two strand hook clasp.  There are 4mm sterling silver Bali style beads on each end of the necklace.  I added a three inch (7.62cm) sterling silver chain extender that has a sterling silver Bali style bead dangle.

This necklace can be worn with a pair of jeans or with a much dressier outfit.

If you don’t know what size you need, use a tape measure to measure snugly around the wrist bone, with no extra space. description:

These earrings are small, approximately one inch (2.54cm) in length, including the sterling silver earring wire.

Mystical Powers of Moonstone: Moonstone is one of the gemstones that is believed to have many mystical and healing powers. The stone is associated with the moon and was the stone of the goddess Diana. Moonstone is said to enhance intuition, promote inspiration, and bring good fortune and success in both love and business.

The nature of baroque pearls is that no two are exactly alike.  Each pearl has a unique shape but they are all beautiful.

Labradorite is a grayish green gemstone with beautiful flashes of blues and greens.

I wire wrapped each pearl and laborite gemstone with argentium sterling silver wire.

The necklace has a large sterling silver lobster clasp and is approximately 41 inches (104.14cm) long, so it can be worn as one long single strand, or doubled for a totally different look.

Although the stones are called rainbow soochow jade, the stones are actually serpentine, a very common silicate mineral. The beautiful rainbow colors of this semi precious stone are created via heat-treatment - the different colors result from heating the serpentine to different temperatures, resulting in permanent color change. These particular stones are a mix of pale greens, olive browns, and burgundy.

The necklace is 17 inches (43.18cm) in length, not including the 14-k gold filled large lobster clasp.

name: Yellow Jade Chip and Silver Handcrafted Karen Hill Tribe Leaf Earrings
description:
These earrings are made with yellow jade chips and have pretty Karen Hill Tribe silver charms.

The earrings measure approximately two inches (5.08cm) in length and have sterling silver ear wire.

The neutral colors of the chips will compliment many outfits in a wardrobe.

See more of my gemstone jewelry here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/TaliCreationsJewelry?section_id=10910493

To see more of my creations, visit my shop: http://www.etsy.com/shop/TaliCreationsJewelry

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

History of Karen Hill Tribe Silver - The leaves used in these earrings were individually handcrafted by silversmiths of the Karen Hill Tribe of Thailand. Karen Hill Tribe sterling silver is always 95 to 99% pure silver. Sterling silver is 92.5% pure.

The Karen Hill Tribe's beautiful silver designs reflect the Karen's own beliefs and ideas about the harmony of nature. Each of the silver charms, pendants and beads reflects not only the high quality of work from the Karen tribe, but they also embody centuries of history and culture.

From the beginning the Karen silversmiths were taught to carefully and lovingly handcraft each of their silver designs from scratch. They learned to give each design a unique appearance that is only duplicated in their own creations. Their silversmith work ethic and skills have been passed down from mother to father to children.

Today, each handmade ornament is a unique masterpiece that represents centuries of Karen culture and art. And each piece of silver purchased helps to preserve the timeless culture, art, religion, and language of the gentle Karen Hill Tribe people.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
History and Folklore - All Jade has symbolic meaning and folklore attached to it. Throughout the centuries jade has been known to bring wisdom and tranquility, and to protect the wearer from harm.

Yellow jade is said to bring energy, thoughtfulness, happiness and joy. It is also believed to help the body's digestive system.

If you need the bracelet made larger or smaller, send me a message after checking out, and I will make the necessary adjustment before shipping at no extra charge.

The bracelet will arrive in an attractive box suitable for gift giving.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Jade: For centuries it has been believed that jade provides its wearer luck and protection. Jade is also believed to promote peacefulness of the mind and tolerance towards others.

Moonstone: Moonstone is one of the gemstones that is believed to have many mystical and healing powers. The stone is associated with the moon and was the stone of the goddess Diana. Moonstone is said to enhance intuition, promote inspiration, and bring good fortune and success in both love and business.

Ohm Symbol: Ohm or Aum is of the utmost importance in Hinduism. This symbol is a sacred syllable representing Brahman, the impersonal Absolute of Hinduism — omnipotent, omnipresent, and the source of all manifest existence.

Ohm sign signifies God, Creation, and the one-ness of all creation
